message.body: So I'm thinking about getting mom and dad a flat screen tv for xmas from me, you, Victor and Steph... any thoughts on that?
Is that something they wanted?
Idk... I know dad hates the current tv in the living room. Always wanted a flat screen for baseball
They going on sale this Friday online. Figured it'll only be $100-something and divided by the four of usn 5 if we include Robert so won't be real expensive
Nevermind... Victor said he doesnt see it as something
What do you mean? He doesn't think they want it?
Yea said its not something they want or need.......

" I wouldn't mind chipping in for anything but I'm pretty sure a tv isn't something either of them want or need. Considering he calls my tv a "fancy tv" and looks down on anyone with modern conveniences I'm pretty sure dad wouldn't even appreciate that he might not even accept it"
Oh okay
Yeah he might be right
I would like to chip in for something though
Read what he said and let me know what you think. If not we can split something else
I think dinner is nice. We should all go out with her but also get her something too
Yea I know but i swear they are the hardest two ppl to shop for
Haha yeah
A lift? That's a little odd but sure
Wait I just looked at the price. What the hell
Also, are we still on for tonight?
Still on for tonight yes... and I know right! A tv is "frivolous" but a forklifting ladder is not?!
I checked It out... its 10.5 ft tall (wouldn't even stand up in the living room) and its for warehouse usage. Not home use... what could he possibly do with that.
I can see if he even worked in a warehouse and lived these things but all he does is watch tv.... therefore a tv seems more relevant than a forklift. So back to no clue what to get him
Yeah... I think it's safe to say no haha
Hahaha
And what do you want to do? Meet somewhere? Or stay in?
And yeah it's gonna be hard
Idk.. movie is still an option but whatever anyone else wants. Don't matter to me
Okay cause I'll be at penn so let me know by when I get out at 9 so I know where to go
Ok np
Steph said movie night... that ok?
Sure
Oh we are at dawns if you get done before we go home
Okay
Is it okay if kiara comes?
Of course
Stop at dawns if you're almost home
When I got there the train had just left
So it might be a while
Oh ok
Just left dawns. So will be home
K were just getting out at Oregon
Kiara texted me saying she couldn't lock the front door
I forgot to tell her it's busted
Oh yea.. was locked when I woke up. You locked it?
No it must've worked for her
Oh ok unless marc left after her and did it he normally leaves extra early but that's goof it was locked
